comment.author: 46624315@N04
comment._content: She was a drowning victim whose body was discovered in January of 1914. She had been missing a month, there was speculation of suicide. query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?_r=1&res=9900E...

comment.author: 79328406@N07
comment._content: Thank you for the link indeed... I've been following the case story in the NY "The Sun" at the Library of Congress Newspapers database and I couldn't find the solution to the case until I came upon this page.  Thank you.

comment.author: 79328406@N07
comment._content: I went to Google Maps and found Ocean Avenue in Coney Island and it ends at an esplanade bordered by rocks which I presume is where they found the body.  Not sure why this caught my curiosity to such levels, but I am glad to have pursued it.  May she rest in peace.
